website_summaries.verdict: Easily clear up blackheads and blemishes with this natural face mask.
pros: Contains tomato, aloe, watermelon, pumpkin, and chamomile to hydrate and condition skin
Removes excess oil and helps prevent breakouts without drying out skin
cons: For peak effectiveness, you need to apply quite a thick layer of mask

customer_reviews.title: Great to for blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Love and support the company. This mask works great for getting rid of blackheads and pulling gunk out of your pores. I use it a couple times a week to help combat mask-acne. I have very sensitive skin and this does not cause any issues for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a pretty good mask, I like that it is thick and it makes my skin feel refreshed and clean after I use it. I tried the biore pore cleaning strips and they hurt and are too rough for my sensitive skin. This gives my pores a good deep cleaning without being harsh. I have sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts and this has not caused any new breakouts and I think it helps prevent future ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chelz

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to mask! Make sure you really put a generous layer on... your face should be a pretty uniform charcoal grey color, don’t use a thin layer. My (sensitive) skin feels so soft afterward.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Came popped at the end so most of the tube was a waste. It’s an ok mask, my skin was a little to sensitive for this but I can see it working for people with oily skin. Sensitive skin with acne is hard to deal with, so while it didn’t work for me doesn’t mean it won’t work for you. But you may run the risk of the tube being popped so might be better to buy in stores
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the size of the tube this is a little pricey but it’s a good product! It visibly tightens skin and shrinks pores after every use. I’ve noticed my skin goes “back to normal” a day or so after use but all in all I love This mask
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mud mask for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This brand is hit or miss for my sensitive skin, and this product is a moderate hit with me. It is a bit pricier than I would personally like to pay for, but it is of decent quality and works well for my acne (in addition to my daily face wash, sheet mask, and moisturizer made by different brands). If you have REALLY sensitive skin, I wouldn't recommend it because I have moderately sensitive skin and it leaves a slight tingle for the first minute or so after applying but not nearly as bad as their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Elle E. Meier

customer_reviews.title: And I don’t feel like it has the same effectiveness as other charcoal masks ...
customer_reviews.text: The strong perfume smell of this mask is too overwhelming for me. Maybe I am more sensitive to odors than others might be, but it is off putting and distracts me from my attempt at relaxation/ bath. And I don’t feel like it has the same effectiveness as other charcoal masks I have tired. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I quite like this mask- no dry skin or redness from using, fun to play with mud again! Haven’t noticed a huge difference with my acne beyond regular flare ups and clear skin
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but works well
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't smell as some others have said. It seems a bit thinner than other masks I'm used to, but seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Tea and tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: The last tube that I had lasted for almost a year!!!! But I use it as if I'm at a spa. So every Saturday morning, I make tea, and apply my mask. I watch the news and 10 minutes later, I rinse off and go run my errands.
customer_reviews.author: Semone Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... does not leave the face feeling stripped or dry like most mask
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does exactly what it claims and does not leave the face feeling stripped or dry like most mask. This is my favorite one in comparison to some of the high end and drug store mask I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Shontae H.

customer_reviews.title: Use it for CLEAN pores
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product as a single use pack from my local box store. I loved it as a weekly deep clearer. This cleans out my pores of the week grime and leaves my face soft. I found that this product works best for me when I allow it to fully dry on my face and start to pull. It may not look pretty and gets a little uncomfortable, but it does a wonderful job with my oily skin. Definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative to the Origins charcoal mask....
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. I prefer the Origins charcoal mask, but this is a comparable replacement that's more affordable. It works better when you use it with a facial steamer, or open up your pores before you apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. It does crack if u move your face too much. Been using this mask for years and works great
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: It has evened and cleared my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Like a facial in a tube. I can literally see the dirt and blackheads it has pulled out off my pores on the surface of my mask as it dries, gross but true. You can see and feel it working!
customer_reviews.author: Diana G

customer_reviews.title: This mask is amazing. Anytime I feel a breakout coming on
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing. Anytime I feel a breakout coming on, I slap some of this one and it is crisis averted. Definitely going to re-up when my current supply runs out.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Best mask out there for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Best mask out there for oily skin. I use it nightly to reduce breakouts. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this frequently due to oily, acne-prone skin. Definitely helps reduce the amount and size of blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical. My skin looked and felt better after 1 use... softer, more even, brighter. My new go to skin care product. I’ve always been into charcoal and natural stuff... this product is just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Great face mask. Not the greatest smell but doesn’t smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have been using the for about 4 months hoping for ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the for about 4 months hoping for results and have not seen any improvement. In fact, my skin started getting more red and irritated. I do not think I will be using this product any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Arestova

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product came to me with the seams busted and product all over the tube :/
customer_reviews.author: kenneth henry

customer_reviews.title: it smells amazing and is not irritating so I like to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't do much for my skin. My blackheads are still there when I wash it off. However, it smells amazing and is not irritating so I like to use it anyway, just in case :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Love that it’s in a tube. This makes it easy to apply and it won’t dry out. Not sure if it’s helped my skin yet, but I will keep using it and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Feels like silly putty
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if maybe I got a bad bottle but this was awful, felt like silly putty and did nothing for my skin like other brands have.
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin super soft, but doesn't do much more than that. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin feel fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this, and it does feel like a good mask. Doesn't break me out and irritate my skin. I use it once a week and its good.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: I use this once a week or around my cycle ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a week or around my cycle and it seem to take off excess oil. It doesn't dry my skin. I still have to try it around a time when my skin is misbehaving but maybe if i use it weekly, I won't have those moments.
customer_reviews.author: Topello

customer_reviews.title: Already open and ready for use
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken open at the top. The contents (mask liquid) was oozing out of the top. I am not going to send back as, like I said, the liquid is coming out. But I do expect amazon to refund me, give me a credit, or replace the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It’s smells great and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: AReyOfSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great Mask! I used it a little too often at first and dried out my skin, but now, I use bi-weekly, and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Shea moisture clarifying mask works better.
customer_reviews.text: The mask was okay. Didn't see huge results. Shea moisture clarifying mask works better.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: So great for the price
customer_reviews.text: So great for the price! It is not irritating and I have noticed my skin clear up after the last few weeks of using it 2-3 times a week
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I had pretty typical acne when I was a teenager, but when I hit around 18 it got really bad. I'm 21 now and have used every product out there and this could easily be one of the best. It is better than many way more expensive masks I've tried. I use it at night, followed by witch hazel oil and my face lotion and the next day it's an unbelievable difference. It doesn't say how many times a week it can be used so I usually do one, but will do up to two if I'm having a particularly rough skin day. I can't recommend it enough. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: What's most important to know?
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes our face feel like its tightening. It gives me the feeling that it's working its magic and it made my acne zits way smaller. If only been using for two days now. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Quenitara

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry skin with a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: Don't make the mistake I made with my first tube of this product: it doesn't take a thick, dark layer to get the same results as a thin, almost translucent layer! This is a very cleansing mud mask and it dries hard, letting you know when it's time to wash away. I use it in conjunction with a moisturizer every time so I can't quite comment on the drying qualities of this mask, but with a moisturizer, this has worked very well with my dry and flaky skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Saw clear skin working a few days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Hyppolite

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! My skin feels fresh, clean, and moisturized after using. I have acne prone skin and it's helped to keep my breakouts at bay. I will definitely continue to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My teenaged daughter swears by this line and prefers the “tomato” products for her teen skin.
customer_reviews.author: carole hostetter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mask my skin is clear and soft and it smells nice too. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J

customer_reviews.title: Finally acne free!
customer_reviews.text: I used to get break outs bad but once I started using this product after showers I very rarely have break outs anymore! Couple this with witchazel scrubs in the morning and you'll be acne free in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Reed

customer_reviews.title: Product was received expired, I ordered in June 2018 ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was received expired, I ordered in June 2018 and got a mask that had expired in may 2018. Not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Carly Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Best mask
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face mask!! I wish i had time to use it more but it makes my face so soft.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. My face feels amazing afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Army

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite line for taking care of my skin! Package arrived with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like what I use to buy in the stores ingredients are definitely not the same
customer_reviews.author: TyTiana

customer_reviews.title: Good for Oily, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I apply as mask for my sensitive and oily skin. My skin feels good after applying. It works for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Sirisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great but be careful with packaging it's a bit fragile
customer_reviews.author: Lily Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: EXP MAY 2018
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on Apr 2, 2018, EXP MAY 2018!!!!! I just realized now. It is too late to return.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Everything came fast good price But the expire date on my tube of Yes to tomatoes mud mask is 6/2019
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! Not drying!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It makes my skin feel clean and purified without drying out. It's a once a week essential in my skin routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my skin within one use! It will feel tingly and make your skin itch, but that didn't seem to be a lasting effect from the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My face is EXTREMELY clean and clear when I use this. When I say clear, I mean dirt, impurities, pores have been reduced dramatically! It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mia mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product extremely good in cleaning blemish on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Madhu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I love it. I have used so many acne products and find that this is the best. Feels good, smells great and does not dry your skin. You must try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: I use every product in this tomato with charcoal line. I battled adult acne for years and kept trying harsh products with no response. I FINALLY found a product that keeps my acne at bay with no harsh chemicals. I use the wash, this mask, the body soap and the mouisterizer. I love everything about this line!
customer_reviews.author: ardavis08

customer_reviews.title: Not sure...
customer_reviews.text: Not yet convinced there is much to this. It hasn't seemed to help with the oily Tzone which is what I was hoping for. But my skin does feel nice after using.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I price shopped this at other stores and it was more expensive so ordered from Amazon. Was exactly as expected. Great product. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Novagyrl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mask! I was struggling with pimples and this mask cleared my face after putting it on three times since then if I am starting to break out I will put it on and the acne will disappear. I did not have a ton of pimples, but regardless this mask cleared me up. I have tried other mask that are supposed to clear acne but instead make me break out even more.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Vega

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using every few days for a couple of weeks -- so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff & Things

customer_reviews.title: Overbearing perfume scent
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this considering it's probably the cheapest natural charcoal mask on the market, but I just could not get past the unnecessary added fragrance. The product itself works pretty well, but the old lady perfume smell irritated my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my 14 year old immediately! He didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for my 14 year old immediately! He didn't want to use it. Now he's begging me to get more! Gentle and very effective! Thanks "Yes to..." !
customer_reviews.author: laura childs

customer_reviews.title: Great Charcoal mask at a fraction of the cost of Glamglow
customer_reviews.text: Great Charcoal mask at a fraction of the cost of others! I usually use GlamGlow Charcoal Mask but the cost has led me to look for a different product. It is a thinner consistency than some of the others I have tried but my skin feels great afterwards and it has not left the skin pink or irritated like some of the other thicker and more expensive formulas. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This mask smelled good (but not too strong) and I felt like it ...
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Yes to Tomatoes a few months ago and have been using their soap ever since. This mask smelled good (but not too strong) and I felt like it helped the overall appearance of my skin. I have used it twice now and will use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff... I use it 2x a week, it helps keep my face clear.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like anything. Hoped it would at least have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hurt my skin, doesn't help it. I have sensitive skin with both eczema and acne. I thought this might help with the acne. It definitely doesn't, but nothing does. It does clean my face well. Was just hoping for a little more with the mask. Doesn't smell like anything. Hoped it would at least have a nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Say yes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Yes to products. This mask is better than the other Tomato mask. My face feels clean afterwards, and the mask easily comes off after 10 minutes. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Edwards

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This line is helping to clear cystic acne. I use the calm lotion afterwards and try to use this once or twice a week or as a spot treatment. It really seems to be helping so far after a few months trying. It could be the sun but I am finally seeing a difference in my skin. I would reccommend this with the cucumber calm line.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of my favorite face masks. I have sensitive, combination skin and this leaves my face feeling super clean and fresh. You really only need to use a thin layer and the bottle lasted much longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aundra-LynTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: best for acne
customer_reviews.text: All Yes to tomatoes products that we have tried, including this one, have been a godsend to treat my son's acne. They work wonders, by far better than any expensive acne medications we have tried. I use other Yes product for my skin care regimen, and they all are great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: I bought for my daughter and she loves it, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter and she loves it, she used it yesterday and already told me that her skin is so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonesa

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so easy to use and really works. When I first heard about it I thought the charcoal craze was just that, a craze. But this mask makes your skin look and feel different. I made my now-husband use it before we did our engagement pictures and he was amazed at how his face felt after it washed off. I recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Deitrich

customer_reviews.title: What a Shame! No good for me, sadly!
customer_reviews.text: Awful awful product, surprisingly. I was beyond excited to buy this & used twice and my forehead broke out big time & hasn’t gone away for 5 months :(. I tried contacting the company before leaving negative feedback BUT it’s impossible to get a real human, even a personal email! I can’t even return it....
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: This face mask feels nice on the skin but is nothing special
customer_reviews.text: This face mask feels nice on the skin but is nothing special. It is a fair product for the price. It didn't do anything magical for my acne but helps to calm my face when I am having a bad flare up. It smells nice, is a little difficult to wash off and I would recommend using a brush to apply. Other than that it is a fun product but nothing special (i didn't expect it to be for 8 bucks) but it is a very nice product for its price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Haney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! Buying this multi-use tube is far more economical than buying the individually packaged masks of the same brand. Always makes my skin feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... doing much for my acw but it makes me happy using it
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem to be doing much for my acw but it makes me happy using it. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mask for break out prone skin. I use it once a week on average and it makes my skin pretty soft and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good results, strong scent
customer_reviews.text: The product works well, the scent is a bit strong in a perfume sense, not my fave. It did make my face feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: It does have a light odor (not tomatoes) kind of like plastic or clay
customer_reviews.text: I would make sure you test this on your skin first. I made the mistake of putting it all over my face and it was really inflamed and broke out for the rest of the week. It does have a light odor (not tomatoes) kind of like plastic or clay.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I've used this at the onset of a breakout, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this at the onset of a breakout, and it seemed to really work and lessen the acute pimples that were forming.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Does not do much for acne, but it does clean the face okay. Not going to continue to use it as it really does not work. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: OldManWorking

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Have had adult acne for some time now. Using this mask has helped me curb unexpected breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: I've found that it staves off acne breakouts like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I use this on mornings after I fall asleep with my makeup on. I've found that it staves off acne breakouts like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Westby

customer_reviews.title: Mud mask
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring it out. Not noticing what it does yet
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Works well and you get a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Works well and you get a lot of uses for your money. Makes my skin soft and feels clean although I'm sure if it is helping my acne.
customer_reviews.author: HannahW

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: You can see the difference after using it. Works even better when I use it after steaming.
customer_reviews.author: Yamini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far - definitely helped with my current breakout
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D

customer_reviews.title: She says that it is very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She says that it is very good quality ... I only bought it, but I trust her :)
customer_reviews.author: KDOR

customer_reviews.title: ... I received was oily and actually made my skin worse.
customer_reviews.text: What I received was oily and actually made my skin worse.
customer_reviews.author: warriors4

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Once they saw how much it improved my skin, they started using it too! I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: ObjectiveReality

customer_reviews.title: Good face mask
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my pores out fairly well, nice scent, and didn’t over dry out my skin. I have oily skin and issues with acne into my 20s. This got a lot of junk out of the pores on my nose, and I didn’t feel like my face was a desert after use. It was a little flakey as it dried, but maybe I didn’t apply a think enough layer? Easy to wash off and left my skin feeling smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not a peeling mask, you have to let dry then rinse off
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite charcoal mask. It does wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressive with cleaning my pores. It did leave my skin feeling very soft.
customer_reviews.author: MTRynk

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Started clearing up all of my acne and dark spots after one use. I use it once a week and my face has been extremely clear and healthy looking!
customer_reviews.author: ^.Faith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific. It is affordable but works very well. It sloughs away dead cells and unclog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean look to face however doesn't help with blackheads around the corner of nose
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do much for my blackheads which are there specifically around my nose, it just gives a little clean look however that is not all that I wanted out of it. I bought it for blackheads and it doesn't completely get rid of them. The application of this mask does give a clean nice look to your face though.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This mask is amazing. It keeps acne at bay
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing. It keeps acne at bay, leaves my pores feeling smaller, and acts as an effective chemical exfoliant. Best of all, it is gentle enough for me to use often-- sometimes every day. I have extremely dry, sensitive skin and have never had a negative reaction to this product, or any discomfort at all. On the contrary, my skin feels softer and healthier the more frequently I use this. I'll be repurchasing when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but works pretty good. I have combo acne prone skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: A little drying, but works pretty good. I have combo acne prone skin and have a difficult time finding food product, so I am happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for acne/oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Such an unexpectedly great mask. I use this mask weekly and it does such a good job at clearing out the pores.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel B.

product_meta.title: Yes To Tomatoes Facial Mud Mask w/ Detoxifying Charcoal - Facial Mask for Acne Prone Skin | 2 ounce
product_meta.description: Yes to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Mud Mask
feature_bullets: Yes To Tomatoes and Charcoal to help remove impurities and clear up acne
Formulated with salicylic acid to treat and prevent acne breakouts and a botanical blend of tomato, aloe, watermelon, pumpkin and chamomile extracts to help condition skin
Rich, creamy formula helps reveal a beautifully conditioned complexion
To use: Apply a generous amount to clean skin and let it work its detoxifying magic for 10 minutes. Rinse off with water to reveal your clean and clear
96% natural ingredients. Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones. Leaping Bunny Certified. Vegan
